```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ozbabynames)
```

# get data



```{r}
SAbabies <- ozbabynames::ozbabynames %>%
  filter(state == "South Australia") %>%
  write_csv("SAbabynames.csv")
```

```{r}
SAbabies %>%
  filter(name %in% c("Jenny", "Charles")) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = count, colour = name)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(title= "Number of babies born in SA", y = "Number of babies", x = "Year")
```
